title: InSCI Community Survey
body: International Spinal Cord Injury (InSCI) Community Survey is an international initiative to initiative to improve the lived experience of people living with SCI.

title: SCI Cognitive Study
body: Spinal cord injury cognitive study aims to describe the extent and severity of cognitive impairment in adults with SCI.

title: SCI Wellness Project
body: Spinal cord injury wellness project aims to develop a health maintenance tool that will assist people living with SCI in self-managing their spinal needs.
